import React from "react" import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBInput } from 'mdbreact'; import axios from "axios"; class Signup extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state ={ username:"", email:"", password:"", password2:"", error:{} } } changeUserName=(event)=>{ this.setState({username:event.target.value}) console.log(this.setState) } changeEmail=(event)=>{ this.setState({email:event.target.value}) } changePassword=(event)=>{ this.setState({password:event.target.value}) } changePassword2=(event)=>{ this.setState({password2:event.target.value}) } onSubmit= e=>{ const newUser={ username:this.state.username, email:this.state.email, password:this.state.password, password2:this.state.password2 } console.log(newUser); axios.post("http://localhost:6000/api/users/register",newUser).then(data=>{ console.lof(data); }) }; render(){ const {error} =this.state return(

Sign Up

) } } export default Signup;
